title: The Journey of the Soul: An Islamic Perspective on Life, Death, and the Hereafter
author: MD FAIZANUL HAQUE
summary: The journey of the soul after death is a profound topic in Islam. The Quran, Hadith, and Islamic scholars provide insights into what happens after a person dies, how they are placed in the grave, and what they experience.

title: THERE IS NO ESCAPE
author: MD FAIZANUL HAQUE
summary: This article discusses humanity's shortsightedness in planning for the future, emphasizing that death is inevitable and worldly pleasures are temporary. It highlights Islam's teaching that life is a test for the Hereafter, urging believers to live righteously and prepare for accountability.

title: Balancing Duniyah and Akhirah: The True Path to Happiness and Purpose
author: MD FAIZANUL HAQUE
summary: This article explores the Islamic perspective on happiness, purpose, and achievement, stressing the importance of balancing worldly life (duniyah) with the afterlife (akhirah). It highlights that true fulfillment comes from aligning life with faith and worshiping Allah, using examples from the Quran and the lives of the Prophet's companions.
